content: Hi all, I also posted a question on https://users.rust-lang.org/t/failure-to-deduce-bound-when-using-const-generics-and-generic-associated-types/55592 but figured I would probably get a faster and more correct answer here. Basically I am trying to figure out if I should expect the snippet to compile once the const_generics feature is completed. I would expect that the trait bound would be auto-deduced since it can be fully evaluated but from the paragraph on the RFC I think it's meant to work this way. Also using parameter deduction for the single statement on the final create function leads to ICE. Hope I am not breaking any rules by posting this here!
FWIW, this stream (#t-compiler/help) is meant to ask for help when hacking on the compiler. You may have more answers in #general instead.
